response.original_title: An Update With Former Vice-President Al Gore
response.overview: An Update With Former Vice-President Al Gore is a half-hour addendum to An Inconvenient Truth (2006). In this documentary, Gore discusses new data that has been collected since the movie's completion about a year ealier. It includes some extended scenes that add to the context of Gore's lecture.
